module.name: reactable2opc
module.description: Interpret the OSC stream coming from the table and feed the OPC.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Interpret the OSC stream coming from the Reactable. Also provide a way to send to forward messages to OSC. \n

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
The port on which to receive the table OSC stream
The port on which to receive the additional OSC stream
The port on which to send the OSC stream
The IP address where to send the OSC stream
Should the Y axis of the table be inverted?
Should the X axis of the table be inverted?

input.description: Accepts various commands: "osc" "your_message" : forwards a message to the OSC stream connected.
